# Acknowledgements

React Unity is made possible thanks to many open source projects. Notable ones are:

- [ClearScript](https://github.com/microsoft/ClearScript)
- [ExCSS](https://github.com/TylerBrinks/ExCSS)
- [Jint](https://github.com/sebastienros/jint)
- [OpenUPM](https://openupm.com)
- [React](https://reactjs.org)
- [unity-jsb (QuickJS)](https://github.com/ialex32x/unity-jsb)
- [unity-websocket-webgl](https://github.com/jirihybek/unity-websocket-webgl)
- [Websocket-Sharp](https://github.com/sta/websocket-sharp)
- [Yoga](https://yogalayout.com)
